reviewText: What a Girl. Unfortunately, the discs are corrupted. I missed some of the conversations because the disc skipped or stopped. I thought I bought a new set.
Such a hilarious, warm and touching drama about innocent love and devotion.
PMP Entertainment release says "Region 3" on the case, but it's apparently Region 0. It plays fine.
it is region 3 although it was described as a region 1 when I order it. it is problem to play using my dvd player.
A great Korean drama that has everything, great characters, twists and is very funny. I totally recommend seeing and buying the series

I would like to thank once again the retailer for sending me the DVD and ahead of time. Arrived just before the x-mas holiday, my mom couldn't even wait she quickly opened and was so surprised and happy she even did a dance.
DVD quality and subtitles - GREAT
Sound quality - GREAT
